text: Marko Živić (4 April 1972 – 14 October 2021) was a Serbian actor and comedian. His career began in 2002 while performing at the Belgrade Drama Theatre. He was known for his roles as Mika Armonika in Psi laju, velar nosi and Vasilije in Shadows over Balkan.Marko Živić: Gluma me čini boljim čovekom (in Serbian) He also was in the movies Čitulja za Eskobara, The Belgrade Phantom and Montevideo, God Bless You!. Živić also hosted the The Marko Živić Show. Živić died on 14 October 2021 in Belgrade, Serbia from COVID-19 at the age of 49. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Serbian television actors Category:Comedians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgrade
title: Marko Živić
